INSERT INTO TBL_INQUIRY_ANSWER(INQ_ANS_CODE, INQ_ANS_CONTENT, INQ_ASGN_CODE) VALUES( FN_CREATE_CODE('TBL_INQUIRY_ANSWER', SEQ_INQUIRY_ANSWER.NEXTVAL) , #{inquiryAnswerContent} , ( SELECT INQ_ASGN_CODE FROM VIEW_INQUIRY_TOTAL WHERE INQ_CODE = #{inquiryCode}) )
mapper.select:
SELECT NOTICE_CODE AS noticeCode , NOTICE_SUBJECT AS noticeSubject , NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent , TO_CHAR(NOTICE_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS registeredDate , ADMIN_CODE AS authorAdminCode , ADMIN_NICKNAME AS authorAdminNickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , N.NOTICE_CODE , N.NOTICE_SUBJECT , N.NOTICE_CONTENT , N.NOTICE_REG_DATE , A.ADMIN_CODE , A.ADMIN_NICKNAME FROM TBL_NOTICE N LEFT JOIN TBL_ADMIN A ON N.REG_ADMIN_CODE = A.ADMIN_CODE
WHERE N.NOTICE_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE N.NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE A.ADMIN_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY N.NOTICE_REG_DATE DESC ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TBL_NOTICE N LEFT JOIN TBL_ADMIN A ON N.REG_ADMIN_CODE = A.ADMIN_CODE
WHERE N.NOTICE_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE N.NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE A.ADMIN_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT N.NOTICE_CODE AS noticeCode , N.NOTICE_SUBJECT AS noticeSubject , N.NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent , TO_CHAR(N.NOTICE_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS registeredDate , A.ADMIN_CODE AS authorAdminCode , A.ADMIN_NICKNAME AS authorAdminNickname FROM TBL_NOTICE N LEFT JOIN TBL_ADMIN A ON N.REG_ADMIN_CODE = A.ADMIN_CODE WHERE NOTICE_CODE = #{noticeCode}

SELECT FAQ_CODE AS faqCode , FAQ_SUBJECT AS faqSubject , FAQ_CONTENT AS faqContent , TO_CHAR(FAQ_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS registeredDate , ADMIN_CODE AS authorAdminCode , ADMIN_NICKNAME AS authorAdminNickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , F.FAQ_CODE , F.FAQ_SUBJECT , F.FAQ_CONTENT , F.FAQ_REG_DATE , A.ADMIN_CODE , A.ADMIN_NICKNAME FROM TBL_FAQ F LEFT JOIN TBL_ADMIN A ON F.REG_ADMIN_CODE = A.ADMIN_CODE
WHERE F.FAQ_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE F.FAQ_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE A.ADMIN_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY F.FAQ_REG_DATE DESC ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FAQ F LEFT JOIN TBL_ADMIN A ON F.REG_ADMIN_CODE = A.ADMIN_CODE
WHERE F.FAQ_SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE F.FAQ_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE A.ADMIN_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT F.FAQ_CODE , F.FAQ_SUBJECT , F.FAQ_CONTENT , F.FAQ_REG_DATE , A.ADMIN_CODE , A.ADMIN_NICKNAME FROM TBL_FAQ F LEFT JOIN TBL_ADMIN A ON F.REG_ADMIN_CODE = A.ADMIN_CODE WHERE F.FAQ_CODE = #{faqCode}

SELECT INQ_CODE AS inquiryCode , INQ_SUBJECT AS inquirySubject , INQ_CONTENT AS inquiryContent , TO_CHAR(INQ_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS inquiryAcceptedDate , ADMIN_POST_CATEGORY_TYPE AS postCategoryName , USER_ACCT_CODE AS inquirerAccountCode , USER_NICKNAME AS inquirerNickname , ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , INQ_ANS_CODE AS inquiryAnswerCode , INQ_ANS_CONTENT AS inquiryAnswerContent , INQ_STATUS AS inquiryStatus FROM VIEW_INQUIRY_TOTAL WHERE INQ_CODE = #{inquiryCode}

SELECT RPT_TYPES AS reportType , USER_RPT_CODE AS userReportCode , USER_RPT_CONTENT AS userReportContent , TO_CHAR(USER_RPT_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS userReportAcceptedDate , APPLICANT_ACCT_CODE AS applicantAccountCode , APPLICANT_ACCT_USER_NICKNAME AS applicantUserNickname , SUBJ_ACCT_CODE AS subjectAccountCode , SUBJ_ACCT_USER_NICKDNAME AS subjectUserNickdname , APPLICANT_ADMIN_CODE AS applicantAdminCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS applicantAdminNickname , ASGN_ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ASGN_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , USER_RPT_ASGN_CODE AS userReportAssignmentCode , TO_CHAR(USER_RPT_ASGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS userReportAssignedDate , USER_RPT_ANS_CODE AS userReportAnswerCode , USER_RPT_ANS_CONTENT AS userReportAnswerContent , USER_RPT_RSLV_CODE AS userReportResolveCode , TO_CHAR(USER_RPT_RSLV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS userReportResolvedDate , RPT_STATUS AS reportStatus , RPT_RSLV_RESULT AS reportResult FROM VIEW_USER_RPT_TOTAL WHERE USER_RPT_CODE = #{reportCode}

SELECT RPT_TYPES AS reportType , CREW_RPT_CODE AS crewReportCode , CREW_RPT_CONTENT AS crewReportContent , TO_CHAR(CREW_RPT_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewReportAcceptedDate , APPLICANT_ACCT_CODE AS applicantAccountCode , APPLICANT_ACCT_USER_NICKNAME AS applicantAccountNickname , SUBJ_CREW_CODE AS subjectCrewCode , SUBJ_CREW_NAME AS subjectCrewName , APPLICANT_ADMIN_CODE AS applicantAdminCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS applicantAdminNickname , ASGN_ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ASGN_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , CREW_RPT_ASGN_CODE AS crewReportAssignmentCode , TO_CHAR(CREW_RPT_ASGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewReportAssignedDate , CREW_RPT_ANS_CODE AS crewReportAnswerCode , CREW_RPT_ANS_CONTENT AS crewReportAnswerContent , CREW_RPT_RSLV_CODE AS crewReportResolveCode , TO_CHAR(CREW_RPT_RSLV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewReportResolvedDate , RPT_STATUS AS reportStatus , RPT_RSLV_RESULT AS reportResult FROM VIEW_CREW_RPT_TOTAL WHERE CREW_RPT_CODE = #{reportCode}

SELECT RPT_TYPES AS reportType , CREW_POST_RPT_CODE AS crewPostReportCode , CREW_POST_RPT_CONTENT AS crewPostReportContent , TO_CHAR(CREW_POST_RPT_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewPostReportAcceptedDate , APPLICANT_ACCT_CODE AS applicantAccountCode , APPLICANT_ACCT_USER_NICKNAME AS applicantUserNickname , SUBJ_CREW_POST_CODE AS subjectCrewPostCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_CODE AS applicantAdminCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS applicantAdminNickname , ASGN_ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ASGN_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , CREW_POST_RPT_ASGN_CODE AS crewPostReportAssignmentCode , TO_CHAR(CREW_POST_RPT_ASGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewPostReportAssignedDate , CREW_POST_RPT_ANS_CODE AS crewPostReportAnswerCode , CREW_POST_RPT_ANS_CONTENT AS crewPostReportAnswerContent , CREW_POST_RPT_RSLV_CODE AS crewPostReportResolveCode , TO_CHAR(CREW_POST_RPT_RSLV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewPostReportResolvedDate , RPT_STATUS AS reportStatus , RPT_RSLV_RESULT AS reportResult FROM VIEW_CREW_POST_RPT_TOTAL WHERE CREW_POST_RPT_CODE = #{reportCode}

SELECT RPT_TYPES AS reportType , CREW_CMNT_RPT_CODE AS crewCommentReportCode , CREW_CMNT_RPT_CONTENT AS crewCommentReportContent , TO_CHAR(CREW_CMNT_RPT_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewCommentReportAcceptedDate , APPLICANT_ACCT_CODE AS applicantAccountCode , APPLICANT_ACCT_NICKNAME AS applicantUserNickname , CREW_POST_CODE AS crewPostCode , SUBJ_CREW_CMNT_CODE AS subjectCrewCommentCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_CODE AS applicantAdminCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS applicantAdminNickname , ASGN_ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ASGN_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , CREW_CMNT_RPT_ASGN_CODE AS crewCommentReportAssignmentCode , TO_CHAR(CREW_CMNT_RPT_ASGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewCommentReportAssignedDate , CREW_CMNT_RPT_ANS_CODE AS crewCommentReportAnswerCode , CREW_CMNT_RPT_ANS_CONTENT AS crewCommentReportAnswerContent , CREW_CMNT_RPT_RSLV_CODE AS crewCommentReportResolveCode , TO_CHAR(CREW_CMNT_RPT_RSLV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS crewCommentReportResolvedDate , RPT_STATUS AS reportStatus , RPT_RSLV_RESULT AS reportResult FROM VIEW_CREW_CMNT_RPT_TOTAL WHERE CREW_CMNT_RPT_CODE = #{reportCode}

SELECT RPT_TYPES AS reportType , MEET_RPT_CODE AS meetReportCode , MEET_RPT_CONTENT AS meetReportContent , TO_CHAR(MEET_RPT_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS meetReportAcceptedDate , APPLICANT_ACCT_CODE AS applicantAccountCode , APPLICANT_ACCT_NICKNAME AS applicantUserNickname , SUBJ_MEET_CODE AS subjectMeetCode , SUBJ_MEET_SUBJECT AS subjectMeetSubject , APPLICANT_ADMIN_CODE AS applicantAdminCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS applicantAdminNickname , ASGN_ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ASGN_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , MEET_RPT_ASGN_CODE AS meetReportAssignmentCode , TO_CHAR(MEET_RPT_ASGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS meetReportAssignedDate , MEET_RPT_ANS_CODE AS meetReportAnswerCode , MEET_RPT_ANS_CONTENT AS meetReportAnswerContent , MEET_RPT_RSLV_CODE AS meetReportResolveCode , TO_CHAR(MEET_RPT_RSLV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS meetReportResolvedDate , RPT_STATUS AS reportStatus , RPT_RSLV_RESULT AS reportResult FROM VIEW_MEET_RPT_TOTAL WHERE MEET_RPT_CODE = #{reportCode}

SELECT RPT_TYPES AS reportType , MEET_CMNT_RPT_CODE AS meetCommentReportCode , MEET_CMNT_RPT_CONTENT AS meetCommentReportContent , TO_CHAR(MEET_CMNT_RPT_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS meetCommentReportAcceptedDate , APPLICANT_ACCT_CODE AS applicantAccountCode , APPLICANT_ACCT_NICKNAME AS applicantUserNickname , SUBJ_MEET_CMNT_CODE AS subjectMeetCommentCode , SUBJ_MEET_CODE AS subjectMeetCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_CODE AS applicantAdminCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS applicantAdminNickname , ASGN_ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ASGN_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , MEET_CMNT_RPT_ASGN_CODE AS meetCommentReportAssignmentCode , TO_CHAR(MEET_CMNT_RPT_ASGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS meetCommentReportAssignedDate , MEET_CMNT_RPT_ANS_CODE AS meetCommentReportAnswerCode , MEET_CMNT_RPT_ANS_CONTENT AS meetCommentReportAnswerContent , MEET_CMNT_RPT_RSLV_CODE AS meetCommentReportResolveCode , TO_CHAR(MEET_CMNT_RPT_RSLV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS meetCommentReportResolvedDate , RPT_STATUS AS reportStatus , RPT_RSLV_RESULT AS reportResult FROM VIEW_MEET_CMNT_RPT_TOTAL WHERE MEET_CMNT_RPT_CODE = #{reportCode}

SELECT RPT_TYPES AS reportType , COURT_REV_RPT_CODE AS courtReviewReportCode , COURT_REV_RPT_CONTENT AS courtReviewReportContent , TO_CHAR(COURT_REV_RPT_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtReviewReportAcceptedDate , APPLICANT_ACCT_CODE AS applicantAccountCode , APPLICANT_ACCT_NICKNAME AS applicantUserNickname , SUBJ_COURT_REVIEW_CODE AS subjectCourtReviewCode , SUBJ_COURT_REVIEW_CONTENT AS subjectCourtReviewContent , APPLICANT_ADMIN_CODE AS applicantAdminCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS applicantAdminNickname , ASGN_ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ASGN_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , COURT_REV_RPT_ASGN_CODE AS courtReviewReportAssignmentCode , TO_CHAR(COURT_REV_RPT_ASGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtReviewReportAssignedDate , COURT_REV_RPT_ANS_CODE AS courtReviewReportAnswerCode , COURT_REV_RPT_ANS_CONTENT AS courtReviewReportAnswerContent , COURT_REV_RPT_RSLV_CODE AS courtReviewReportResolveCode , TO_CHAR(COURT_REV_RPT_RSLV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtReviewReportResolvedDate , RPT_STATUS AS reportStatus , RPT_RSLV_RESULT AS reportResult FROM VIEW_COURT_REVIEW_RPT_TOTAL WHERE COURT_REV_RPT_CODE = #{reportCode}

SELECT RPT_TYPES AS reportType , COURT_NAME_RPT_CODE AS courtNameReportCode , COURT_NAME_RPT_CONTENT AS courtNameReportContent , TO_CHAR(COURT_NAME_RPT_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtNameReportAcceptedDate , APPLICANT_ACCT_CODE AS applicantAccountCode , APPLICANT_ACCT_NICKNAME AS applicantUserNickname , SUBJ_COURT_NAME_CODE AS subjectCourtNameCode , SUBJ_COURT_NAME AS subjectCourtName , APPLICANT_ADMIN_CODE AS applicantAdminCode , APPLICANT_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS applicantAdminNickname , ASGN_ADMIN_CODE AS assignedAdminCode , ASGN_ADMIN_NICKNAME AS assignedAdminNickname , COURT_NAME_RPT_ASGN_CODE AS courtNameReportAssignmentCode , TO_CHAR(COURT_NAME_RPT_ASGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtNameReportAssignedDate , COURT_NAME_RPT_ANS_CODE AS courtNameReportAnswerCode , COURT_NAME_RPT_ANS_CONTENT AS courtNameReportAnswerContent , COURT_NAME_RPT_RSLV_CODE AS courtNameReportResolveCode , TO_CHAR(COURT_NAME_RPT_RSLV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtNameReportResolvedDate , RPT_STATUS AS reportStatus , RPT_RSLV_RESULT AS reportResult FROM VIEW_COURT_NAME_RPT_TOTAL WHERE COURT_NAME_RPT_CODE = #{reportCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ADMIN
WHERE ADMIN_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE ADMIN_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT A.ADMIN_CODE AS adminCode , A.ADMIN_EMAIL AS adminEmail , A.ADMIN_PWD AS adminPassword , A.ADMIN_NICKNAME AS adminNickname , YN.YES_NO AS chiefAdmin FROM TBL_ADMIN A LEFT JOIN TBL_YES_NO YN ON A.CHIEF_ADMIN_CODE = YN.YES_NO_CODE
